parameters.query: ={{ "SELECT (SELECT row_to_json(sub) FROM (SELECT i.id, i.type, i.tenant_id, i.client_final_id, i.numero_facture, i.date_facture, i.date_echeance, i.montant_ht, i.montant_ttc, i.tva_taux, i.statut, i.lien_pdf, i.id_externe_paiement, i.created_at, cf.email, cf.nom, cf.prenom, cf.raison_sociale FROM invoices i LEFT JOIN client_finals cf ON i.client_final_id = cf.id WHERE i.id = '" + ($json.invoiceId || '').replace(/'/g, "''") + "' AND i.tenant_id = '" + ($json.tenantId || '').replace(/'/g, "''") + "') sub) AS invoice" }}
